table_description: Rate limit information for GitHub GraphQL API endpoint.

columns.name: cost
columns.description: Number of points used to return this query.

columns.name: used
columns.description: Number of points used from current allocation.

columns.name: remaining
columns.description: Number of points remaining in current allocation.

columns.name: limit
columns.description: Maximum number of points used that can be used in current allocation.

columns.name: node_count
columns.description: Number of nodes returned by this query.
